channel.title: Need help connecting my server to my client
channel.description:
My problem: When I try to connect to my server on another computer with my client I always get "error connecting to server". In all the tutorials ive read none actualy tell you how to set up the client. Either that or im not looking hard enouph.
I have already portforwarded, Im running the server, Im running no-ip, U-torrent/7-zip is not running.
Im not sure what alse it could be other then something inside the client.
What i want to know, is do I need to configure anything, and if i do what?
If you do know of a tutorial that would be greatly appreciated. Or you could explaine it yourself below.' Thank you to everyone who gives an answer.

item.title: Need help connecting my server to my client
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

I have client working on both PC’s so im guessing i did it right. >.>

Lol, i thank you for the help. now to learn the fun stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help connecting my server to my client
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

I found it, what do i put in the Server.enter(“127.00.01”)

Do i put my Ip in or do i put some other ip? I know thats the local host.

I GOT IT!

Thank you so much for your help. IF theres anything i can do to repay you, other then give you money. >.> i will.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help connecting my server to my client

item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Alright, and thanks. Im new to the rsps world, and moparscape forums.

Am i still looking for the GUI, EGUI, or Client class folders? <— There in the client folder right?

I think i just solved the problem. One second, im testing now.
